Shopkick - http://www.shopkick.com/join-us Shopkick is cross-retailer loyalty & shopping platform that combines the online and offline worlds. We have over 6 million users. Macy's, Best Buy, Target, Old Navy, General Mills, and Proctor & Gamble are just a few of our partners. We are backed with $20 million in funding from Kleiner Perkins and Greylock Partners. Shopkick is profitable! We're still small, but we are growing "fast".
